properties.areaDesc: Waters from Okaloosa-Walton County Line to Pensacola FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Pensacola FL to Pascagoula MS from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 5 at 4:35AM CST until February 6 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25
knots with gusts up to 30 knots tonight through Thursday
afternoon. For the Gale Watch, west to northwest winds 25 to 30
knots with gusts around 40 knots late Thursday afternoon into
Thursday night. Seas 6 to 8 feet tonight will build to 8 to 13
feet Thursday into Thursday night.

* WHERE...Waters from Pensacola FL to Pascagoula MS from 20 to
60 NM and Waters from Okaloosa Walton County Line FL to
Pensacola FL from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to
3 PM CST Thursday. For the Gale Watch, from Thursday afternoon
through late Thursday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM CST THURSDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT
